column3:
Baganpara - Agri Bundh Damaged | As per report received on 05/07/2023 from concerned 
authority BDO dhamdhama block and WR department on 25/06/2023 ,80 meter approx reach length 
agri bundh have been damaged at village Adla/simlabari area.(26.69256,91.440569)),  
Agri Bundh Damaged | As per report received on 05/07/2023 from BDO dhamdhama block on 
25/06/2023 agri bundh approx 30 meter reach length have been damaged at Bagulamari 
village.(26.683148,91.429719))

Barpeta - Public Health Engineering (PHE) | As per report received from The Executive Engineer 
(PHE), Barpeta Division, Barpeta and Junior Engineer (PHE), Bahari Division on 05/07/2023, 04 
nos. of HTW installed at various raised platforms under Barpeta Rev. Circle

Bihpuria - Culvert Damaged | Damaged slab Culvert at Ch. 1700m of Bahbari Tunijan to Gabharu 
Tunijan road as reported by PWRD, Nowboicha Territorial Road Sub Division on 06/07/2023,  
Culvert Approach Road Damaged | Approximately 60 meters of Culvert approch road damaged at 
Gabharu Tunijan due to the affect of Gabharu river (Uttar Laluk GP) under Karunabari 
Development Block on 06/07/2023 ,  
Fisheries/Pond | 25 nos. Ponds (2.5 ha) affected at Gabharu Tunijan, Rangajan as reported by FDO, 
Karunabari Circle on 06/07/2023,  
Agri Bundh Damaged | Approximately 300 meters of the bundh under MGNREGA scheme at Anil 
Morang Chuburi damaged as reported by officials of Karunabari Development Block on 
06/07/2023,  
Kadam - Fisheries/Pond | Due to incessant rain and raising of water level of the River kakoi total 8 
hectare of water area got affected, reported by Fishery Officer, dated 06/07/2023,  
Narayanpur - Culvert Approach Road Damaged | Damaged of RCC culvert slab and approach at 
chainage 746 m culvert no1/1 at bhogpur to bholabari road as per report from PWD roads,  
Fisheries/Pond | 14 nos pond affected (2.38 Ha)

Khairabari - Culvert Damaged | As reported by the department on 04.07.2023, due to incessant 
rainfall for last few days the slab culvert measuring 3.0M approx. on Jalukbari Chowk to Banderi 
village was damaged. GPS Coordinates: Lat: 26.58589 Long.: 91.87753

Gohpur - At Dakhin Deonabari | Bank erosion is oberserved on R/B of river Solengi for a length of 
30 mtr on 06/07/23 | 0 | (Long - 93.642885, Lat - 26.910851)

Katigorah - Kunapara T.E. to Sindura XI | As reported by PWD Borkhola-Katigorah (T) Road 
Division and as per field inspection by Circle Officer Katigorah Revenue Circle along with Field 
Officer (DM) and AEE, CID (W.R) Div. Badarpur, it was observed that the Kunapara T.E. to 
Sindura XI PMGSY road is under the severe threat of erosion because of river larang which is 
flowing adjacent to it. An area of 250 mts (approx) has been severely eroding and if it continues the 
road connectivity will be closed. Severe erosion has been observed at the stretch since 01.07.2023 
to still today i.e. 06.07.2023 | 15000 | (Long - 24.583739, Lat - 92.321867)

Sissiborgaon - At No.1 Sunarighat (Rev. Village) | The Brahmaputra floods have caused erosion in 
No.1 Sunarghat. None of the houses have been washed away by the erosion so far. The area of the 
landslide is about 40 bighas (As per Lot Mondal reported).dated 05-07-2023 | 317 | (Long - 
94.782028, Lat - 27.501328)

Dhubri - Aminerchar | Erosion is going on (by the river Brahmaputra) at village Aminerchar As per 
the field verification w.e.f 30/06/23 to 05/07/23 it is seen that till now 36 nos of family has been 
affected (total area = 20Bigha-1Katha-5Lessa) | 214 | (Long - 89.928875, Lat - 25.987545),  
Agamoni - village Lohajani | Riverine area of River Gangadhar at village Lohajani under Boterhat 
GP under Agomani Revenue Circle is getting eroded day by day. The detail of the area eroded is 
given below for your kind perusal: • Name of the village: Lohajani under Boterhat GP. • Date of 
Incident: 30th June’2023 to 6th July’2023. • Time: 3.00 PM. • GPS Co-ordinates: Lat: 26.254122, 
Long: 89.834342 • Land: 0B-1K-5L. • Population and household damage: NIL | 0 | (Long - 
89.834342, Lat - 26.254122),  
Bilasipara - Sinamari, under Bilasipara Revenue Circle | recently erosion has taken place by the 
river Gaurang at village: Sinamari, under Bilasipara Revenue Circle. A field visit in this connection 
has been done on 06-07-2023 by me along with Field Officer, Disaster Management, Bilasipara. 
The detail of the area is given below for your kind perusal: • Name of Village:- Sinamari. • Date of 
incident:- 03-07-2023 to 06-07-2023 • GPS co-ordinates:- Lat:- 26.296915 N & Long:- 90.23658 E 
Lat:- 26.296873 N & Long:- 90.236552 E • Land eroded:- Land measuring around :- 01 Bigha 02 
Katha 10 Lessa. • Population:- 18 No’s (3 No’s of families) | 18 | (Long - 90.236580, Lat - 
26.296915)

Kamalpur - Gathijan area on L/B of Puthimari Embankment | Active erosion seen at Gathijan area

AEE, Rangia-Kamalpur WR Sub-Division on 05.07.2023. | 0 | (Long - 91.382111, Lat - 26.187470)
